title: "Their ADC is out of position alone it's the perfect time to kill them!" - Assassin
body: "Nvm it was Vayne and she assassinated me with a targeted Q + auto attack before I could even damage her"

replies.body: Oh good, you used Vayne.  For a second I thought this was a complaint about assassins being too weak.  But it's a Vayne hate thread.
Most of the assassins are terrible though. Why play them when you can just play Annie and get frontloaded damage while also having the safety of range?
Because you don't have the targeting flexibility (mobility) of a real assassin with Annie?
aye. no parkour.
Who needs mobility when everyone is dead?
{{item:2055}} "I can't see her FUUUUUUUUU!"
literally took away 70% of her counterplay with that change
I play {{champion:117}} and just press buttons on her to completely shut her down and negate her invis for the duration of her puny life.

then she gets qss and 1 shots you
feelsbadman
dunno if you can qss polymorph, but in any case pix reveals her stealth and team promptly collapses on her because if she cleanses my w my q is right on her ass for 2 second 90% slow, problem solved.

but your team is still focusing the tank...
feelsbadman
You can qss polymorph, its cc.

Even if you waited out the Shiv proc and walked into melee range? Hm. 

Vayne's always been the anti-assassin ADC so whatevs.
Anti assassin adc, there is something seriously wrong with that, like REALLY FUCKING WRONG, Assassin<ADC<Duelist<Assassin
Not really. Anti-Assassin ADC < Teamfight ADC
Yet somehow she is both, have you seen vayne in teamfights?
Yeah I've seen her. She gets kited or blown up if she isn't fed or @6 items.
Vayne? Kited? In what universe are you living?
The one where kiting exists. The amount of CC and mobility make it possible.

Im sorry, are we talking about darius or vayne here?

Vayne has extremelly high movement speed, she has a low cooldown dash and invisibility on an ultimate, at the same time she has a knockback/stun and she is ranged.

How the fuck does she get kited? She is the one who kites!

So she can just tumble into the enemy team then?

There's a reason Vayne spotting was a popular meme.

Kiting out silver bolts is part of why she isn't a top tier pick.

No she will just tumble out of the way of anything that isn't a targeted spell and be invisible so no targeted spell can hit her. Then she'll 2 shot your adc tumble again and wait for her tank to peel your tank so she can kill that poor mofo in less than 4 seconds. because your mage already got jumped on by the assassin because fuck it Vayne Killed the ADC faster than they could due to the rework.

{{champion:40}} Vayne, please, let's both of us stop trying to carry this whole game and admit you're in danger!

{{champion:67}} Who are you talking to right now? Who is it you think you see? Do you know how much gold I make per game? I mean, even if I told you, you wouldn't believe it. Do you know what would happen if I suddenly decided to stop building damage? This game ceases to exist without me! No, you clearly don't know who you're talking to, so let me clue you in. I am not in danger, Janna. I am the danger. An ADC goes into the team fight and gets blown up and you think that of me? No. I AM THE ONE WHO KITES!
vayne isnt the anti assassin adc, shes the anti tank adc...
She's the anti-everyone ADC*
Anti-tank has always translated to duelist...
% hp true damage -> anti tank

Every champion builds tank stats via sustain or health early game. Fact is, Vayne uses that % true damage to win extended trades, no matter against who.

She also has 2 flat AD boosts. And CC, which tanks usually don't mind thanks to tenacity stack.
true, but she is also very slippery, esp without a pink ward to stop her, which makes it very difficult for a tank to put out any damage onto her whatsoever
Yeah, you either burst ADCs or you try to ignore their damage. "Putting damage on them" is rarely an option.
That's like saying Jinx is "op" because she blows everyone up from 200 feet away in a team fight lol. She's doing what she's supposed to do.

Jinx has low mobility though, assassins still delete jinx if they get to her. Vayne simply dashes, and 2 hits the assassin that get near her, The new masteries, itemization and general meta of this season has her in an overly strong position. Vayne is not supposed to blow up everyone in 1-4 shots regardless of range and whether they're an assassin, fighter, or another adc once she completes 2 or 3 items. Yet she does, she one shots as often as jhin late game, but with good mobility and dueling, jinx and jhin blow up teams from afar, yes, but they die instantly to assassins, and have little mobility comparatively. They need heavy team peel to sit back like that, Vayne does not, she can 2 shot the mid lane talon if she meets him in the jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=MontethePython,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ymG3pMpv,comment-id=0006000100030001,timestamp=2016-11-14T23:40:41.180+0000)
>
> Jinx has low mobility though, assassins still delete jinx if they get to her. Vayne simply dashes, and 2 hits the assassin that get near her, The new masteries, itemization and general meta of this season has her in an overly strong position. Vayne is not supposed to blow up everyone in 1-4 shots regardless of range and whether they're an assassin, fighter, or another adc once she completes 2 or 3 items. Yet she does, she one shots as often as jhin late game, but with good mobility and dueling, jinx and jhin blow up teams from afar, yes, but they die instantly to assassins, and have little mobility comparatively. They need heavy team peel to sit back like that, Vayne does not, she can 2 shot the mid lane talon if she meets him in the jungle.

Yeah that is bullshit. having to fear her insane damage/mobility means she a lot of defensive and offensive power, either you are a fast cherry tapper or else you should be a immobile blaster, not someone that shoots out rapid fire nukes at 1000 shots per second.
Vayne is not even weak early game anymore, back to the Vayne cycle where she dominates everything until Riot inevitably guts her, when will Riot realize Vayne is impossible to balance?

% max hp true damage was never a healthy mechanic 

**cough** tank fiora **cough**
They brought down tank Fiora.
still disgusting against squishy team.

> [{quoted}](name=The Deckowner,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ymG3pMpv,comment-id=0007000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-14T15:47:49.284+0000)
>
> still disgusting against **squishy team.**

What isn't disgusting against a squishy team?  Even supports hurt a squishy team.
Reworked assassins.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2346120811/212142416?tab=overview

I respectfully disagree.

one game is not really a great sample size.

especially when u have a rengar who is basically broken.

This is why I keep asking for her to be nerfed. Even if you manage to get in range, she tumbles away, then if you still are sticking to her, she e's. By then she can probably turn on you and kill you, even if she hasn't e'd you to a wall, her tumble is up again to outplay, and her ult bonus ms towards you makes running not an option. Tuning her numbers wont help, they need to get rid of the invisi, give her tumble a bigger cooldown/get rid of it, or get rid of her e. Otherwise the same issues will keep coming up.
Just like with darius and jayce. In their prime they are basically unapproachable without multiple champions or an incredible gold lead.

And she's like nidalee or reworked talon in that, even if youre able to kill her in a 1v1, and her damage is truly no threat for some reason, shes hard as fuck to chase, even when grossly out of position pushed up in botlane while the rest of her team is at baron.

Gee since you put it that way it sounds so much like EKKO.
_why does riot put in champions with problems and not any champions that have solutions_
Meanwhile adc mains "Riot added more counterplay the assassin class, please buff adcs because having the most dps in the game and a role devoted to protecting you isn't enough"
I'm actually fine with not getting any ADC buffs and I main ADC.  I'm a shit/extremely meh level Vayne player too.
I always avoid trying to assassinate her as Zed. It's impossible if the Vayne is even slightly decent.
This! Immediately you come out of untargetability, she E>R>Q and proceeds to whittle you down shot by shot. Frustrating AF.
